Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: After i . p . injection to rats , abecarnil and diazepam decreased in a time - dependent and dose - related ( 0 . 25 - 20 mg / kg i . p . ) manner [ 35S ] TBPS binding measured ex vivo in the cerebral cortex .

The paragraph does not mention any disease entities. The animals mentioned are rats, which are not considered diseases. 35S and TBPS are also not diseases, they are:

* 35S: A radioactive isotope of sulfur, commonly used in molecular biology and biochemistry as a tracer.
* TBPS: A ligand that binds to the GABA receptor, used as a radioligand for studying the GABA receptor in the brain.

So, the table above presents the entities in the paragraph that could be considered "Disease" entities, but none of them are actually diseases.
